Article: TITLE: Primary central nervous system Hodgkin's lymphoma: a case report. ABSTRACT: Primary central nervous system Hodgkin's lymphoma (CNS-HL) is extremely rare. This current case report describes a 60-year-old male patient that presented with numbness of the left lower extremity and worsening headache.
